medical_history.chief_complaint: Admitted for feeding difficulties and growth failure.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The infant has been experiencing feeding difficulties since birth, with a poor daily intake of 300 mL of special milk formula for premature infants, resulting in below-normal weight gain (600 g in six weeks). By two months old, the infant was dystrophic, weighing 2710 g.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Intrauterine growth restriction, oligohydramnios, and ventriculomegaly during pregnancy.
